ACT
170
Returning the will to the testator
A will that is kept by a court, notary public or consular or diplomatic-consular representation of the Republic of Croatia shall be returned to the testator at his request.
The will will also be returned to the testator's attorney who has a certified power of attorney for that job.
A record shall be drawn up of the return of the will, in which the manner in which the identity of the person to whom the will is returned was determined will be stated.
If the will is returned to the proxy, the power of attorney shall be attached to the minutes and kept by the person who returned the will.
The court, public notary, or consular or diplomatic-consular representation of the Republic of Croatia that has returned the will to the testator or his representative shall without delay send a notification to the Croatian Register of Wills.
